nodes.text: The Alliance War Museum was an institution dedicated to the exhibition and preservation of artifacts and information related to the Rebel Alliance's military efforts during the Galactic Civil War.

Located on Coruscant, the majority of its items were either donated by former Alliance members or recovered by Operation Flotsam under the Historical Battle Site Preservation Act, which also funded the museum. Its curators were aggressive in acquiring well-known items, and harassed Han Solo for years to donate the Millennium Falcon.
